text:
Hi Asher. So I projected it big to be super brutal like in dailies. Your hero character is losing a lot of fine hair detail from the left side of his head. It's a very clean greenscreen so you should be able to get that. The new background has nice detail but I don't think the defocus matches the plate. You have the props in the background so they are your reference. Try using a zdefovus or convolve with a custom kernel so you get an effect that matches the plate rather than just a plain old blur.

Other than that looking good!
